original_text: And he said to them, “Have you never read what David did, when he was in need and was hungry, he and those who were with him:
korean_text: 예수께서 이르시되 다윗이 자기와 및 함께 한 자들이 먹을 것이 없어 시장할 때에 한 일을 읽지 못하였느냐

sentences.original_text: “Have you never read what David did,
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 행한 일을 읽어 본 적이 없느냐,

sentences.original_text: when he was in need and was hungry,
he and those who were with him:
